body: tl;dr, is it a power fantasy or not? Came expecting the dude who was fucking someone's girl to get shot or some shit with the tags. Skimmed it and started thinking it was a nerd boy's power fantasy.
I have never expected a hentai doujin to have such a meaningful story, this is the first time.
He so fucking idiot fuck hope too see he die fast
Leave it to a human to fuck everything up.
lol stupid mc. when you had bora all by yourself you fucked other girls

leader? pfftt what a joke he is only a small time thug who only knows how to control people using fear but then again though it's effective excessive use of fear would lead to discomfort and that discomfort would put him out of his misery
That guy is awesome. He actually has the skills of a leader. Looking forward to the ending.
